title: Garlic Edamame Dip
directions: 1. In a food processor, combine the edamame, garlic, parsley, oregano, vinegar, and pepper flakes and pulse until most of the ingredients are chopped and begin to combine. Gradually stream in 6 tablespoons olive oil, watching as the edamame purees into a smooth green sauce, adding more oil if needed.
2. Season with ½ teaspoon salt, plus more as needed.
